definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

Huaihai, economic hub around Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], including parts of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces

Huaiyang county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan

Huaihai Campaign (Nov 1948-Jan 1949), one of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War, considered the determining battle of the war

sentences.english: Huaiyang is one of China's four major cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 淮杨菜可是中国四大菜系之一。

sentences.english: ConclusionDioscored opposita Thunb. polysaccharide possesses a potential effect of immune regulation.

sentences.english: In the past, Huaiyang Cuisine was known for its high price.
sentences.chinese: 在过去淮杨菜就是以名贵著称的。

sentences.english: Results The results showed that Dioscorea opposita Thunb. polysaccharide was significant to Con A induced mice Lymphocyt…
sentences.chinese: 结论淮山药多糖具有一定的免疫功能增强作用。

sentences.english: This book is a no-nonsense guide to American idioms.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是一本淮确实用的有关美国惯用语的书。

grain husk/tip of sth short and slender
name of a river in Sichuan
to deepen (e.g. a ditch)/to extract/to manage/ladle (old)
